mng: (of water) deep and clear, (of wind and rain) howling and pounding, (of light rain) pattering

exm.mng: (of water) deep and clear, (of wind and rain) howling and pounding, (of light rain) pattering
confident and at ease, free and easy
other name of the Xiangjiang river 湘江[Xiang1 jiang1] in Hunan province
the sound of light rain or drizzle (idiom)
